item.title: Paper Review - 一个 Gradient Boosting Decision Trees 的应用
item.description:
General

  • Task: Identify and quantify the influential factors on incident clerance time
  • 贡献：使用GBDT预测解释事故清理时间，提出影响因子的计算方法
  • 不足：并未提出一个新的方法
  • Tool: Decision tree, machine learning
  • Journal: [B] IEEE TRANSACTIONS ON INTELLIGENT TRANSPORTATION SYSTEMS
  • Cite: X. Ma, C. Ding, S. Luan, Y. Wang and Y. Wang, “Prioritizing Influential Factors for Freeway Incident Clearance Time Prediction Using the Gradient Boosting Decision Trees Method,” in IEEE Transactions on Intelligent Transportation Systems, vol. 18, no. 9, pp. 2303-2310, Sept. 2017. doi: 10.1109/TITS.2016.2635719
  • https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/7811191
